actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit to employers for reimbursing the expenses of employees who provide carpooling.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a tax credit for 50% of the first $250 paid to any employee as reimbursement for carpooling expenses.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit to employers for reimbursing the expenses of employees who provide carpooling.
